Reviews.Title: Most watched TV
Reviews.Author: budskie
Reviews.Content: This TV is great. Has a great picture, good sound. This is the third TCL in the house. Put this one in the kitchen on the bar and it is super.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: Zee
Reviews.Content: Good picture, great sound!  Definitely a great deal!!!I've only had it up and going for about a month but absolutely no problems!!!

Reviews.Title: Great picture quality and sound for the price
Reviews.Author: Dennis Badlyans
Reviews.Content: I had bought a smaller TCL earlier in the year and was satisfied given the price.  The sound quality was not good and it required external speakers.  This one has a much nicer look, sharper picture and the sound quality is great.  The only issue i've had with it so far is the remote sensor is on the very right side of the TV so have to make sure i point the remote a little better.  Also - the input button scrolls through the 8 different connectors one by one and I cant disable the unused ones... at least i have not figured out how to do it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Customer Service
Reviews.Author: BinD
Reviews.Content: After few months of use, a grayish vertical line appeared on the left side of the screen. I called customer service, and after multiple attempts, they agreed to service my TV and sent me a box to ship my TV in. When they received it a week later, the panel was completely broken. They "concluded" that it was the customer mistake and voided the warranty and refused to fix the TV. I am not sure how it was my mistake, I shipped the TV using the box they sent me with all the included foam padding.Now I have to buy a new TV, but this time I'll make sure it is from a reputable company. Buy at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Gig Phoong
Reviews.Content: Clear disclaimer, this is only the second TV I've owned and the first was given to me.As it was the first TV I've ever bought, I was really concerned about getting it right. So, I took weeks to find the TV and a few weeks to play with it.Tonight's the night where I can finally feel free to write this review.First off, if you're like me, using this for a PC display is going to be slightly problematic. But that was with the HDMI cable. Not to get to technical but the signal sent from the HDMI cable conflicted with the TV display. This led to off colors and cloudy videos. It stilled displayed in HD but it all felt like it was at a lower quality than my old broken down TV.After playing with the settings for weeks, I finally figured out that you need a VGA or DVI cable to connect. The second I did that, it was night and day. The display couldn't be better.This isn't saying that the HDMI ports are useless. They work just fine with my PS3 playing blu-ray movies crystal clear.All in all, I really couldn't have asked for a better TV for the price.My only complaint is the PC settings. But that was more of a shortcoming on my side than the manufacturer.Though I'm going to hold off on the last star until I get a chance to really play with it in the new settings.

Reviews.Title: great TV for the price.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It is a great TVNice picture, good soundGreat price.I will buy one again when I need it.

Reviews.Title: Happy with this so far!
Reviews.Author: kidglov3s
Reviews.Content: I bought this to replace an ancient 1080i Olevia 32", and so far I'm very happy with it. I've been able to sample a handful Blu-rays (Frozen, Beneath the Planet of the Apes, Streets of Fire (DE), Mulan, Cooler's Revenge, Enter the Dragon) on this and I think the display is free of major issue after turning off all the enhancements (including 3DNR which can be adjusted only when the TV input is selected), turning sharpness all the way down and calibrating contrast/brightness/saturation with THX Optimizer (I used this on the Akira DVD, it can be found on THX DVDs from the early 2000s, which pretty much everyone should have at least a few to choose from). I think the UI could be a little more intuitive, and there could be some more aspect display options, but on the whole I think this is a pretty great deal for $280.

Reviews.Title: Good TV set.
Reviews.Author: Paultre Dunley Dorval
Reviews.Content: Great deal, good pictures and sound ,easy to use menu interface. For $200.00 I got more than I have expected.

Reviews.Title: Excellent with some drawbacks - actually more drawbacks
Reviews.Author: Cosmicgene
Reviews.Content: 58 inch productPicture quality - Outstanding (* with more exceptions)Sound quality - okay, could be betterNo optical sound output, only digital coaxial (not sure how to make it work, but will update).At $600 (on sale) - cannot get any better deal this.TCL makes panels for Samsung, so they know what they are doing. Excellent choice. Combine with at $40 ROKU player, then you have a 'smart TV' that is way better and beats any other big brand smart TV of same size and quality, if you look at the value and viewing experience.I highly recommend this TV.Update: October 26thI have used this for 3 weeks and slowly it turned out to be a dud. The movies turn out like something shot with a 'handy cam' and really terrible. My other 38" toshiba didn't have that feeling and same DVD in my friend's Samsung also seems fine.The TV tuner seem to have a problem. It loses many of my channels every other day and I have to keep rescanning every time. My Toshiba tunes 115 digital channels where as this TV gets around 70, with same digital HD antenna.Initial impression was good but overall experience is disappointing.

Reviews.Title: Dissapointing picture, Motion blurs bad. Its not 120hz
Reviews.Author: Justin L.
Reviews.Content: Advertises and states 120hz right on the box but it only runs 60hz through the HDMI cables? Maybe over the air antenna will run 120 hz? This in my opinion is misleading, I was specifically looking for a 120HZ TV. Picture is bright and contrast is ok so I gave 2 stars. Sound is descent but still its 60hz max refresh through HDMI inputs? Considering returning it but may just keep it if I can adjust it to be ok, since I already mounted it to the wall.Update: After trying every adjustement possible I still can not get the motion blur within a tolerant level. Is hurts my eyes to watch it. In addition the screan jitters acasionally. Dosnt seam to be processing fast enough for even 60Hz I agree with others on to much orange tint, and hard to correct with settings. I decided to return it, maybe its just a bad unit. Would be an ok tv for kids to watch cartoons but pitcure is terrible for sports and HD action pact movies.

Reviews.Title: Best purchase
Reviews.Author: Marduk
Reviews.Content: I have had this TV for over a year now and i have never regretted the purchase.  TCL is actually the Foxconn of Samsung.  So what you are getting is really a top of the line Samsung TV for the price of a Chinese knock off.  I researched TV's for over 3 years before I purchased this one.  It's the best quality TV for the money hands down.  I have never had issues with ghosting, the picture is crisp and clear.  If you need a new TV buy this one!

Reviews.Title: This TV is great
Reviews.Author: Justin
Reviews.Content: It is the same panel that Samsung uses. Looks and Sounds great. The speakers sound amazing. They are loud and don't distort. Will buy a smaller one for my room.

Reviews.Title: love this tv
Reviews.Author: Joe W.
Reviews.Content: High quality low price tv. Although it does not have much features as of those Samsung and Sony, it does its job and made us happy

Reviews.Title: 5 star for value (good performance at a very good price)
Reviews.Author: Charles A. Hart
Reviews.Content: We have been using a 46" "smart" Sony LED TV we purchased from Amazon for the past two years.  We wanted to get a larger TV.  We considered a "dumb" 55" and a "smart" 60" for $150 and $250 more than we paid for this 58" model.  We decided that all we really cared about the the picture quality and a VGA input (we still have computers lacking HDMI outputs).  We already have a Sony "smart" BD player for Netflix etc.We set the TCL up next to the Sony to evaluated picture quality.  I used a WOW BD calibration disc from Disney (also purchased through Amazon) to fine tune each display.Sharpness:At first I was concerned because I could see a lot of "noise" (heavy speckling on both sides of the yard lines) on the TCL vs the Sony watching a football game from an OTA source.  What I discovered is that the TCL "sharpness" processing is not nearly as good as the Sony "sharpness" processing.  When I set "sharpness" to zero on both sets they looked the same.  So if you like to use the "sharpness" effect I would not recommend the TCL set.  Of course "sharpness" is a artificial effect that is not needed with good source material.  It looks good on the Sony when used.  Not so on the TCL.BlueRay:The Sony and TCL set both looked very good with Blue-Ray source material.  I would judge the TCL as capable of a brighter display, important if you do a lot of watching during the daytime in a room without strong light control.OTA Source:We use a DVR to time shift (and commercial skip) almost all of our OTA viewing.  Our DVR converts the recorded 1080I/720P programs to 1080P so the TV does not have to deal with 720P/1080I. OTA programs look very good with our setup. I read a TCL TV review that was not impressed with the de-interlacing abilities.  This poor performance may be related to the poor performance of the sharpness control mentioned above.More Testing:I plan to do more testing and I will provide updates.Amazon:I have nothing but good results from the Amazon purchase of two TVs so far.

Reviews.Title: Great value for the money
Reviews.Author: Azher Ahmed
Reviews.Content: Plugged it in...programmed to my DirecTV universal remote and enjoyed the show.Picture quality is pretty good (black levels, color, etc.) but I'm not videophile.  Audio isn't bad either and has a simulated surround like most modern sets along with volume normalization (great if you have kids).Can't complain. Will update after a software update or two (which I'm sure are on the way based on the other review).

Reviews.Title: Junk and TCL Customer Service is Non-Responsive`
Reviews.Author: Ryan Dye
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV from Sams Club before Christmas at a ridiculously low price.  I'd never heard of TCL before and was leery. In fact, I almost purchased a Samsung model that was about $200 more.  In retrospect, I should have.  This TCL product has been completely frustrating and, in my opinion, it is a piece of junk.  First, the light bleed is terrible on dark scenes and nearly washes them out.  I can't seem to get the picture tweaked to reduce it.  It makes watching movies with alot of dark moments nearly impossible.  Now I'm having problems with the TV randomly shutting off, usually about 10 minutes after turning it on.  Once it clicks off it takes 30 minutes or so unplugged before it will turn back on.  I've sent service requests to TCL twice in the last week, no response.  I'm resigned to just take it back to Sams Club and pay the difference for a better TV.  This is the last TCL product I'll buy.

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: J. Vunk "Vunk"
Reviews.Content: I was a little unsure when buying this tv because some of the other reviews said that it had a lot of light bleed on the darker scenes. However I had a 32" TCL and was very pleased with the quality of tv, that topped with the great price convinced me. What a good thing because this tv is amazing! I have only had if a few days now but i can tell you the tv is awesome, watched Life of Pie on blue-ray and it was like the image was popping out of the tv it was so clear. Excellent purchase and even though the price is low the quality of the image and the tv is not! I would absolutely recommend this tv to everyone. Also i have not noticed any light bleed on darker parts of movies.

Reviews.Title: Stunned with this TV
Reviews.Author: Vintagemac
Reviews.Content: I'm shocked with this TV. Since when can you buy a 50 inch TV for $400? Incredible value. 3 HDMI, 120 Hz refresh, trusurround, Dolby, Srs. I was looking for another TV for my office and for the price I couldn't be happier. My son is thrilled also since his game consoles are connected to it.

Reviews.Title: for the price, it ain't half bad
Reviews.Author: Bellen Shen
Reviews.Content: Picture was fairly dark, so I had to play around with the preset contrast and brightness a bit.  The set itself is very lightweight and easy to move.Mine came with some dead pixels along the top edge of the screen.  Usually, I would go ahead and return it, but again, for the price and the hassle, it ain't half bad.Basically, if you're looking for a TV that gets the job done for cheap, this is a wonderful deal. If you're looking for a 4K OLED 200-inch television with built-in Bang and Olufsen audio, you may want to spend a few minutes to mull over picking this up.Overall: fairly satisfied customer

Reviews.Title: TCL Delivers on size and price
Reviews.Author: Raymond W. Carter
Reviews.Content: Overall a great deal with quality feature you find on the better know brands! You can't beat the price for the size and quality!

Reviews.Title: Awesome value for the price!
Reviews.Author: Abraham Perez
Reviews.Content: Hey it's no Samsung, but man does it give you a sweet picture when hooked up to a blueray or streaming full hd in cinematic mode.  I recommend this tv very much!

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: chop66 "chop66"
Reviews.Content: Ok, on paper this TV has everything that is needed.  Plenty of HDMI port (3), an USB port and digital coax audio output.  It is a slimline LED set that weighs next to nothing ~15 pounds.  60Hz is going to be pretty normal refresh rate and for just about any application it will be sufficient, you will really need to get a really fast moving screen for the refresh to not keep up.  The 1080p picture is full, vibrant and provides excellent picture quality.  Now here is where the deal is cinched - price.  I picked this set up at Amazon for $249 and free shipping.  An amazing price for this size set (40").You may need to tweak it when you get home, but it is well worth the money and you will thoroughly enjoy this set.  My kids put it through its paces using an Xbox One and the TV performed beautifully.  Can't go wrong.I have seen some posts about the stand not having flush screws, did not have to deal with this as I mounted it on the wall.  Looks great, nice small bezel.

Reviews.Title: Decent TV for the money
Reviews.Author: Kevin Capouch
Reviews.Content: Good secondary tv for extra room. Not the quality of my LG, but was not the price either. In some programming the color is slightly skewed.

Reviews.Title: great value!!
Reviews.Author: Karla
Reviews.Content: Purchased this same TV in 2012 at this same price & it worked great until there was a power surge then we lost picture & sound. So i bought another one a couple months ago & purchased a power surge protector this time & so far its works great.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Ana Doud
Reviews.Content: I love this tv. Cheapest price I could find anywhere. Only thing was the color was kind of dark but I fixed that I'm the settings. Otherwise great deal I'd highly recommend it especially for gamers like me.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for a great price
Reviews.Author: Kyle D.
Reviews.Content: You should generally be careful when buying "off-brand" TV's like these, but the important thing always is to make sure they have a warranty and be persistent if something is wrong. Thankfully nothing was wrong with my order when it arrived. The picture is great and the sound quality is surprisingly good. It has a good number of ports (3 HDMI, 1 VGA, Component, and AV). If you use the VGA to connect a computer you need to use a splitter if you want left and right speakers to play. Even if you don't have a splitter, using a single audio cable in left or right AV jack still produces enough sound from the computer.This was an excellent purchase, and it does come with a 2 year warranty so if anything goes wrong in that time I will update this review with how well TCL handles fixing it.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture
Reviews.Author: Dave A
Reviews.Content: Have been very impressed with this TCL TV.  All I had to do was get it out of the box and put 4 screws in the base.  It hooked up very easily and it almost sets itself up.  Works great.  Don't believe you would every beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Great T.V.
Reviews.Author: James Dunn, Jr
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for another flat screen T.V. for a few months.  I visited the big box stores and compared the selection and brands.  For the price I decided to just order the TCL from Amazon.  Was I surprised!  The picture is great, the sound is great I am so happy with the selection.  The setup was easy and I was watching it in minutes.

Reviews.Title: Large TV at a small cost
Reviews.Author: Dwayne E Johnson
Reviews.Content: I have only been using it for a few weeks and so far it is an excellent buy.  The delivery was on time and the shipping box was not damaged.  Irritating problem that has been previously mentioned is the screws for connecting the TV to the stand were missing, but fortunately I am  (sort of) a handy man and I have a lot of screws around my garage, so with a little time to find matching screws the problem was worked around (if an Amazon person that reviews this please mention the missing screws to your appropriate area). The TV needs to be adjusted for each persons taste and there is NO color adjustments!!!  The picture was too red of a tint, but I found (and verified) that when you highlight CONTRAST (in settings) then dial 9735 you get to sub-menu which has the color adjustments. I found this by searching on the make and model which led me to a CNET review and in the postings a person mentioned this sub menu.

Reviews.Title: Pass
Reviews.Author: Durian
Reviews.Content: Very grainy image when watch bluray movies! I dont know why it says 120hz when it's only 60. spend a little extra and get a better television

Reviews.Title: It's a $500 dollar TV
Reviews.Author: Caleb Sanders
Reviews.Content: Would have given three stars except it has a dead pixel in the far right corner. Pretty lame. In terms of people complaining its not 120hz, it's honestly hard for me to say. Most 120hz+ tv's have software enhancements that give it the 'soap opera' effect and thus make it seem incredibly smooth, however this is not due to a 120hz+ panel. This TV does not seem to ghost at all, so while the panel itself could be 120hz all the time, there really is no way to verify it. I am coming from a 2008 Samsung LCD-TV and this TV does do the action/movement shots like sports a lot better.Pros - 500 bucks / extremely light / thin bezel / very good contrast / no ghosting so farCons - Dead pixel / backlight bleed / colors are very hard to adjust (especially for skin tones) / lack of control over specific settingsFinal verdict - I would totally save up a few hundred more bucks and go back with a name brand TV. While you may save with a brand like TCL you lose out in a lot of features. My brother has a 48" 240hz TCL LED-TV and his set seems to be a little better in terms of quality, however his image does look very washed out. It also lacks the menu controls any enthusiast desires.

Reviews.Title: Customer service is trash
Reviews.Author: tim
Reviews.Content: It was great for the first 6 months then all of a sudden it wont turn on, Ive tried different outlets and nothing. Customer service is non existent I was on hold over an hour and finally hung up, TWICE!! Ive tried them on line and the page gets an error message every time. It looks good for the price but its really not worth it. SKIP THIS TRASH!!

Reviews.Title: Great price and great TV
Reviews.Author: ZechariahB
Reviews.Content: This TV has great color clarity.  The 2 year manufacturer warranty and a 4 year square trade ensures you won't be left in the dark without a possible solution for replacement.  Not that I have seen these go out yet and I have tested TCL TVs now for 2 years and have told many people about them.  The internals are well made for long life.  LED is long life based just on it's electrical properties and the TV design.  If you don't want to pay for the "SMART" TV this will certainly work well.  Plugging PCs or other devices to the TV is very easy and haven't seen input problems like other brands.  Thanks Amazon and TCL.

Reviews.Title: Nice Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: S. Peng
Reviews.Content: Fit into the space that 60-inch would not. We like the thin edge and picture quality. And it has a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, great price
Reviews.Author: Frank Von Furstenrecht "fmvf26"
Reviews.Content: TV works great, picture quality much better than expected.  Great range of adjustments possible to suit your taste.  It may not have all the bells and whistles some other units have but most are just not needed.Combined this this with Amazon Fire TV box, and couldn't be happier.Highly recommend TV, for the price it is hard to beat.Delivery of all orders were on time, and all arrived the same day, I didn't have to wait to get all installed and working.Thanks Amazon, it could not be better.

Reviews.Title: amazing tellevision
Reviews.Author: joshua
Reviews.Content: If I could rate this higher I would it is amazing I would recommend this product to everyone great specs and im a gamer and games look amazing on this tv

Reviews.Title: Disappointing quality, even at $600
Reviews.Author: David Zohdy
Reviews.Content: Not a fan of this TV.  Depending on the program I'm watching I will see horizontal ribbons or bars going across the TV.  Also, depending on what I'm watching, 2-3 particular pixels will go white so I see a blank dot in the middle of what I'm watching for the duration of the show.  And finally, depending on the show, some scenes will be crystal clear while others will look terrible... like you're watching it on a fuzzy antenna TV from the 90s.Something also worth mentioning is I have yet to see a program run at 120hz as advertised.  They all operate at 60hz, which is extremely disappointing on such a large TV.It's hard to pinpoint why I'm having these issues.  At first I thought I was just nuts but then as time went on I really felt like I got ripped off.  I called Amazon a little after the 30 day return window (I have only been using it for 2 weeks due to my busy travel schedule) and they stonewalled me.  They offered to take it back as an exception, but I would only get back $235 of the $600 I paid.I called TCL to see what they could do for me and they insisted it was the programs I'm watching and not the TV.  I know this isn't the case because I moved another TV next to this one and watched the same programs... no dead pixels, no ribbons, no fuzz.  So, either this TV is defective (which TCL swears it isn't) or the quality of this model is subpar and will always operate this way.We don't have cable so everything we watch is via Netflix, Hulu, etc., and our internet connection is GREAT with a hardwired connection to a PS3, not wireless.  Our internet speed is 60MB/S and the PS3 we're using gets 35 MB/S via the speed test.  The programs are HD, our internet connection is outstanding, yet the picture quality lacks... tough to say it is on my end and not the TV.Sad part is I want to return it and Amazon won't do anything to help me.  I'm pretty disappointed with this purchase, even at the $600 I paid for it.  This will likely end up just being a computer monitor for me since the TV quality is so poor.I don't recommend buying this.  You can do much better for the money, especially now that HDTVs are dropping in price.

Reviews.Title: Big TV, little price.
Reviews.Author: Jon Leslie "Jon"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 46-inch 60Hz version of this LED several months ago for our bedroom and we loved it...especially for the price.  Well, it was time for the living room to get an upgrade and I went directly for the largest TCL LED I could get and this one is it.So far, it's a terrific TV.  Good picture, although we don't have anything that can make use of the 120Hz refresh as TV and other media go through a Microsoft Windows Media Center HTPC.  It's an absolute "no-frills" TV.  No "smart" capabilities at all and I didn't want them as I have no use for them.  Our HTPC, Roku, XBox, and Wii provide all of that for us, and more.If you don't need all the features, but want the size, this TV is a great deal.  Keep an eye on the price though...it fluctuates A LOT.  You can get it at a really good price if you're patient or aren't in a hurry.

Reviews.Title: Went for size
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: No 3D, no smart TV, just BIG. Love it! I have PS3 so no need for all the extra BS. Hooked up my surround sound and been playing games ever since!

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: ajmidd
Reviews.Content: I like this TV for the many connections it has on the back panel. I have a computer that do not have HDMI connection and this TV have many including a VGA connection for the computer. The picture on the screen is really crisp. I had to make a few adjustment to the color when I took it out of the box, the sound on this TV is find. I know this TV comes with a two year warranty, I took it upon myself and paid $26.00 at square trade for a three year warranty. But I don't think I would need it. The TV is working find. So I recommend this TV reading about its back ground using Samsung back screen parts. If any changes I will give you a update.

Reviews.Title: TCL problem TV
Reviews.Author: Suziesilverado "Suziesilverado"
Reviews.Content: I own the last model.  Within a year the HDMI ports stopped working and the TV would go black for about three to five seconds every few minutes. It provided a stable but lower quality resolution picture with the composite cables.Other people have also reported the problem.TCL phone reps refused to let me bring it to a service center located in a city 40 miles from my house (I planned to drive) and insisted I mail it to them and pay an additional $50 shipping charge.I decided not to bother fixing it since it is just a cheapo kitchen TV.  The sound quality is okay for the price.Never did find a code which worked the TV through my Comcast remote.

Reviews.Title: Affordable quality
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: TCL's picture is sharp and bright.  I use this TV for presentation of Kids Worship on Sunday mornings.  It is working very well.

Reviews.Title: Great Speakers, Good TV & Good Value Overall
Reviews.Author: Stephen W. Templar "rexGun"
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervous about trying a TCL.  I know that Westinghouse helped the Chinese develop and build their HDTV production model and facilities.  To prove it out, Westinghouse has long been a provider of Very Good HDTVs that are excellent values.I have stood in stores with, so called, experts and done a set to set comparison with all of the top brands and Westinghouse only to have the whole group recognize that, when comparing apples to apples,the Westinghouse set actually looks more like real life than the Super TVs.To that end, I have owned three Westinghouse HDTVs over the years, 32, 42, 46.  None has ever died or degraded in quality.  I just keep giving them away, eventually, to my kids, to justify the next size up for our house.The next size up this time is this lovely TCL.  TCL televisions are made in the same factories as the Westinghouse sets.  Some even consider TCL to be an alternate brand name for Westinghouse in the HDTV market.  I had high hopes.I am very  pleased to report that this TCL HDTV is very nice.  It looks great, with a very thin bezel and clean look overall.  It's not super thin, but that is because it uses a full LED back panel instead of just side mounted lights firing across the whole LCD screen.  The upside to this is that if a "pixel" ever burns out, on this set you loose a dot on the screen while on a side lit set you loose a line all the way across the screen.  I prefer this technology.  They are a bit thicker, but they are also lighter.The picture on this HDTV is, once set up to my liking, very good.  It's not quite as good as a true Westinghouse, but most people would not see the differences. Good color, good clarity... James Bond's whiskers look very sharp and clear, as do his eyebrows, I'm too polite to look for nose hairs.  Overall the image is quite good, this set handles water, rain, fire, dust and smoke quite well.  Those are the tough ones.The speakers on this HDTV are much better than you usually get on a "bargain" model.  They are not as good as my Boston Acoustic Home Theater System, but nothing else is either.Overall, I can recommend this HDTV.  It is a good buy and a great value.  I will say this, if Westinghouse makes the exact set that you want then buy the Westinghouse over the TCL.  If TCL makes the set you are looking for then don't worry about it and go ahead and buy the TCL.  All things being equal I still prefer Westinghouse over TCL, but sometimes all things are not equal and you want a specific technology, like this one.  When that happens TCL is quite good for the money.

Reviews.Title: Not the Product
Reviews.Author: Robert Jeffs
Reviews.Content: The T.V.  they sent me wasn't the same as the picture on Amazon. The picture showed an ear phone jack on the T.V. and That is the reason I ordered this. The one I received doesn't have the earphone jack so I can't hook up my wireless headphones so that my neighbors aren't disturbed by the soind of my television

Reviews.Title: Great Price, No problems
Reviews.Author: JaMeya L Bell
Reviews.Content: The 1st TV arrived with a cracked screen, which AMAZON quickly replaced. this TV is functional and serves it's purpose.

Reviews.Title: Not even just ok
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Tv does not have enough or all of the inputs needed to run equipment. NO AV in or out, no RCA in or out, so if you plan on running surround through a high end stereo receiver, forget it. Also Using DISH coax hook up, tv had terrible blur just changing program guide. No other tv i have, has had this problem.. either on that same connection or anywhere else in house. Reading other reviews, I was expecting bold brilliant colors.. not so much.. once on a show, and not changing channels it had difficulty showing program in right size, either I could not read score board, or it was tiny letter box. Again, never an issue with other tv's. I tried all settings to fix, all in all, if this is your first big screen, you may be happy based on performance but mostly price. However this is my 8th, and I will NEVER try to save a few bucks by not buying SAMSUNG again!. Also if you look this company up, it is the OLD RCA company, which I NEVER thought of as quality TV's anyway..

Reviews.Title: Instantly Disappointed
Reviews.Author: R. Stump
Reviews.Content: I purchased the 58" version of this TV, and I was instantly disappointed when first turning it on.  Detail is nonexistent especially in faces and blades of grass, and while black levels ARE impressive, the gamma curve is fixed so that bright colors in every image wash out all clarity.  However, worst of all is the weird hue of too much red and too much yellow which are unable to be fixed with the super-limited color settings on this unit.  Out of the box, the tint setting was disabled, and a firmware update is required to activate it, but even that couldn't get this TV to display a usable image.The only hope to get an image which doesn't hurt your eyes after 4 minutes is to turn down the sharpness, contrast, and saturation to almost nothing.  At that point you have a 58" blurry weirdly-tinted image that reminds you of the big-old rear projection non-HD TVs they sold before DLPs became popular.Perhaps the smaller versions of this TV don't suffer as bad, but I can't stress to you enough my warning to stay away from the 58".

Reviews.Title: Loving this tv
Reviews.Author: Patrick Keitt
Reviews.Content: So just got tv today I have to say the picture is awesome. Build quality is very well made. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is doesn't have a red and white audio out. Which is what I use for my sound bar. It does have a spdif audio out though. Beside that this tv is a great buy. Would. Definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" HDTV
Reviews.Author: edgar cook
Reviews.Content: This was the best price for this size T.V. I could find, including the local big box stores. It came quickly, set up with no problems and works great. I also bought the insurance that seemed like a good buy since I didn't have any history on the brand.I bought a wall mount that makes it easy towards rotates to different parts of the room depending where we are and frees up table space. I'm very satisfied!

Reviews.Title: It's ok...
Reviews.Author: David Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I bought this in a rush because my previous TV (a Samsung 42" plasma) had gone out and I wanted to get a replacement very quickly.  In retrospect, I wish I'd given myself more time and not bought the first thing that jumped out at me.  It's not that it's a bad TV, it's just not great either.  It feels smaller than 40" when I'm watching it, the picture is decent but not quite as nice as the Samsung it replaced.  It has all of the inputs I hoped for (3 HDMI being important to me).  But at the end of the day, it's just an okay tv in my opinion.  For the price, it was a pretty solid option.  That said, a big part of me wishes I'd spent a bit more and gotten something better.

Reviews.Title: Excellant 40 incher for the price.
Reviews.Author: Starz4you
Reviews.Content: You usually get what you pay for or at least that is how it's supposed to be. In this case at  the price I paid $279.00 , I got more than I paid for. Great picture and decent sound, light weight, easy set up. Great basic HDTV.

Reviews.Title: awesome tv
Reviews.Author: Margarita Guzman
Reviews.Content: I usually don't really write a review, however this tv exceeded my expectations. great picture. love to use it with my chrome cast !!!

Reviews.Title: WARNING: Do not buy!!!! Waste of Money!!! READ HERE
Reviews.Author: RainCityCoug
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV last month as a living room TV. I saw the great price and decent reviews online and decided to take a risk and purchase a TV that had mixed reviews... Boy do I regret it.It wasn't a few days before this TV had dead pixels forming before my eyes as I proceeded to tell myself it was a quality TV for the price. Next, the HDMI port proceeded to fail and cause the screen to be fuzzy, having to play around with the cord to get the picture back again. THIS TV IS LOW QUALITY. Sure, I expected sub-perfect quality, but I didn't expect a TV that is just absolutely un-watchable.Returning the TV was a nightmare and I don't wish it upon my worst enemy! I wish I would have just purchased a quality TV to begin with.After dealing with the return, I purchased a MUCH better TV for only $40 more. Trust me, $40 extra is worth the better quality TV and not having to deal with a bad quality TV and returning that bad TV.If you want a QUALITY 50 inch TV, check this one out -----> http://amzn.to/1pGhzna, it is here on Amazon. I currently own it now and have never been HAPPIER! It has a great quality picture and wasn't insanely expensive like some of the other TV's for sale here. Please, save yourself the time and frustration that I put myself through!

Reviews.Title: Great Unit
Reviews.Author: M. Lopresti
Reviews.Content: The only drawback is that the sound is not the best, volume needs to be cranked a bit. However I use headphones much of the time, and sound is more than ample with headphones.In fairness, this is my very first tubeless television so maybe they all have limited sound capability and just don't deliver the punch of tube televisions.

Reviews.Title: Very nice TV, perfect for my new home's living room

Reviews.Content: Before buying this, I had a doubt, comparing to Samsung / LG. With this price, I surprisingly found the video quality is so high and the design was very slim as well. I read the review before purchasing this, biggest TV manufacturer in China with solid quality. I used this TV with my atena purchased from Walmart ($10) and HDMI cable ($16), I can basically play anything on this awesome screen. Highly recommending this, even with atena, you can receive 1920X1080 HD channels, e.g. MSNBC, ABC and Fox26. I am super happy this this purchase :)

Reviews.Title: Needed a TV
Reviews.Author: M. Levering
Reviews.Content: My TV of about fifteen years or better was finally going out on me so I needed to find another one I checked found this one told my husband I was getting he suggested a layaway I said no way we will use payment option but I love my TV just the right size for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Sweet. Great for what I paid for

Reviews.Content: Great for the price. I just need it for my bedroom, so basic TV work fine. Picture is acceptable and sound is above average. I use it for Chromecast, outcome is great. If you budget is under $300 for 40' TV,  then this probably you best choice. I owned a Samsung TV. It is definitely better than TCL, but it costs much more. Again, If you are looking for a basic TV(not smart TV), I recommend it.

Reviews.Author: tbrown

Both the pc and Wii U work flawlessly using HDMI ports 1 and 2. I am not a fan of 120HZ so this 40" tv at such a great price is just what I was looking for.  By the way, Mario Kart 8 is great.  If you have a Wii U buy it, if you don't buy both. :)Settings I used for my Wii UBrightness: 60Contrast: 40Saturation: 45Sharpness: 30Tint: 50Color Mode: NormalBack Light: 65Dynamic Backlight: OffDynamic Light Sensor:Off

Reviews.Author: amazon.sjc
Reviews.Content: For 279$, you cant get a better deal for what you are getting with this TV. There are other reviews and tear downs of this TV where you can see sony display and components inside this tv. though it is not branded as Sony, a majority of its components are pretty good. and if you can look past the brand and just want a good TV , this really serves the purpose. I also use this to play xbox and so far I am happy with it. I have been impressed with my first buy that I bought three of the same size and brand to furnish other rooms of my house

Reviews.Title: Great TV at low price
Reviews.Author: Oliver G. Jones

Reviews.Title: great tv fot the price

Reviews.Title: Good TV.  Especially for a 50" at this price!

The only real shortcoming of this set is when the screen goes to black it makes the edge-lit LED light very noticeable.  It almost looks as there are random splotches of light on the screen.No problems with picture quality though; even on non-HD programming.

Reviews.Title: Awesome

Reviews.Content: This is a great TV great picture,sound,I was amazed with the quality of the brand, I'm very pleased! Thanks TCL

Reviews.Title: a pretty good ourchase

Reviews.Content: So far so good. Great picture quality and sound. I was a bit nervous about purchasing a brand I am unfamiliar with but if works like a tv should. It took effort to get it connected to verizon and I still have to use the tv remote to turn the tv on and off which is why I gave it 4 stars.  Its also way bigger than anticipated but that was me not getting how big a 40 in  tv actually is.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price!
Reviews.Author: Glenn Ian Chapital "ayrton senna"
Reviews.Content: Good TV for the $$$.  FYI folks, this is not a Samsung or Sony picture quality TV. Great TV on a budget. Great TV for gaming. Minor picture adjustments needed to be made: color tint sharpness aspect ratio. All of which are minor. BEWARE! Base of stand screws into body of tv can be stripped if tighten too much! As a postscript, I usually run about 32 for the contrast this TV I have at 16 to 19 contrast.

Reviews.Title: New flatscreen to replace a 27 in analog t.v.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price

Nevertheless, if you're in the market for an inexpensive, functional TV, TCL will work very well for you.

Reviews.Title: Good!!

Reviews.Content: This is one of the best full hd 40 inch tv available in the market for such an affordable price point

Reviews.Title: good value

Reviews.Title: 32" LCD TV

Reviews.Content: Love this TV. For the price it has great picture, easy to set up. Would recommend this TV to anyone needing one for their family.

Reviews.Title: Solid buy television

Reviews.Content: This was a very good deal for the price. The picture is very good as well as the sound. I would recommend it for any one looking for a larger television if they have not gone past 30 inch televisions.

Reviews.Title: So Far Seems to be A Good TV at a Great Price!

Reviews.Content: So far so good! Picture in HD is great! It takes a bit if time for it to power up. Sound is decent. Perfect TV for my parents bedroom. If it lasts, I will be very happy with this purchase. Keep up the good work Amazon :-).

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price

Reviews.Content: Nice TV a crystal clear picture and a great sound. comes with a mount. so far so good. happy with it. It came with sleep timer. just go to menu, settings and there you'll find the sleep timer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent buy

Reviews.Content: Great picture.  Easy setup.  Excellent buy.  Would definitely recommend to family and friends.  Can't beat the price of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Picture quality poor

Reviews.Content: The picture clarity could be better. I expected much more from a 1080. The price and weight defiantly meet my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Meh

Reviews.Title: 40 inch TV

Reviews.Title: Awwwwww-SUMMM
Reviews.Author: Eric D.
Reviews.Content: Yes, I know I spelled awesome wrong...but this screen is so freaking good.  The functionality and ease of use is amazing.  The sound quality is decent (but that is coming from an audiophile).  This TV is by far one of the best cost to value purchases in my life!  I would recommend it to ANYONE.  Buy this, save some money, buy something else that you would have bought the off brand of to get a new high quality TV.  This is WORTH IT!!!

Reviews.Title: Good as a secondary TV
Reviews.Author: Sean Patrick Magill
Reviews.Content: Well, let me start by saying this is my fifth TCL. I have them from 26" up to 42". I bought this one after the HDMI ports in my 4 year old Auria died (since converted to an awesome desktop monitor) that is hanging on the wall in my bedroom. Since master bedroom TV might get watched only 1 or 2 hours a day, there was no need to buy more expensive set. I turn it on when I wake up to watch the news while getting ready for work, and I watch it for a few minutes when winding down before going to sleep.If you have DirecTV, your DTV remote will operate this TV. The sound quality is a bit tinny and has the greatest lack of bass presence of all of my TCL units. Also, the speakers appear to be sending the sound down and back, instead of directly out the front. The picture quality is adequate for my needs; if you are a videophile, you will not like it. It has a hard time displaying black, and for some reason, no matter how much I try to tweak the picture (even using THX Optimizer), it just looks a bit too....fake? Kind of hard to verbalize, but I have yet to get it to where I'm like "there's the picture I'm looking for."It only has 2 HDMI ports, meaning I need an HDMI switch in order to keep my DTV, Blu-Ray, and Roku Player all plugged in.If you are looking for a secondary television, this will be perfect for you. If you are looking for a primary TV - and you have the money - look for something better. I got this one for $192 with tax (stupid NC law), and I'm satisfied with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: James B
Reviews.Content: Looks good so far...I gave it 4stars because it doesn't have audio out av jacks for my stereo.Some I'm trying to get a convert , checking out a few videos on YouTube to see what works...so all is not lost. TV has good colors,pretty good stock sound, picture can be adjusted to your taste. For the price I'll say its worth it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Horatio Tulloch
Reviews.Content: I thought that this TV was going to be no name junk. This TV is actually just as good, if not better than the Samsung in the living room. I would buy this again anytime!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Happy Buyer
Reviews.Author: louanne
Reviews.Content: TV was securely packaged in box and delivered by Fed-ex,2 day delivery.Assembly took 5 minutes and very easy to put together,picture quality is amazing,there are no distortions or shawdows,whether you are looking up.down sideways at the screen,so dont worry if you think you have to sit center front to see the picture. No worry on sound either,speakers are unnecessay to purchase if you are worry about it be loud enough,you can hear this a block away when turn up to the loudest range

Reviews.Title: Customer satisfaction
Reviews.Author: Carol Gibson
Reviews.Content: Totally satisfied with product. Have 3 TV's now. Would recommend to friends. Has a beautiful picture also. Completely satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: E_diz
Reviews.Content: This is my second TCL brand tv - we liked our 40" we bought a couple of years ago so we thought we'd buy a 50" for our living room. Honestly, it's been great...but my only complaint is that a small section (maybe about an inch to an inch and a half) on the top of the screen is lighter than the rest of the screen. It's not noticeable unless the program we're watching has a light / bright part of the show. I have a feeling the tv got pushed up against something and it harmed that part of the screen...it's too late for us to return it for another one but overall, that's my only complaint.

Reviews.Title: Great little Tv/PC Monitor
Reviews.Author: Robot Brothers LLC
Reviews.Content: After you fix the out of whack colors, it works very well for a pc monitor for gaming and media. the ports on the back are a little loose, but its also a 299 tv so that is acceptable.  Its very light so any mount will hold this up.

Reviews.Title: great price ,great tv
Reviews.Author: rex rathbun
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv over a year ago and it has worked flawlessly. it sometimes makes some weird cracking noises but other than that no problems. the picture is great,i bought a sound bar because I wasn't satisfied with its sound,but that's just me. I would recommend this tv to anyone

Reviews.Title: great Tv for this price
Reviews.Author: suajy
Reviews.Content: i wanted a new tv for home , bought this one , they make led panels for samsung . all i can say is i can give 7.5/10 for this tv. great sound , great pic, the best for the price.

Reviews.Title: Okay picture, Good sound, Poor build
Reviews.Author: NuggyBlake "nuggy"
Reviews.Content: The TCL TV is an odd mix. The sound is surprisingly very good  and for general TV viewing does not need a sound bar. The sound is better than TV's twice its price. The picture however was very disappointing. I struggled for 4 days trying to get this TV is look good. I found that it was inconsistent. 720p cable TV looked washed out but 720p movies that I had ripped looked okay. Blacks were okay, but bright colors generally looked posterized and the "blocks" during up conversion were pretty obvious. Funnily enough the 120hz was great watching a BPL football game. My conclusion after fighting settings was that the TV would be great for sports games and watching my own movies (I can control frame rate etc), but for cable TV not so good. Another issue I had was a loose frame around the LED which led to the light bled around the right edge.I sent the TV back. Great value for $499 but not for me.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Macke
Reviews.Content: Great tv! Amazing picture and sound!  Amazon even price matched a competitor and I couldn't be more satisfied with the sale.  For the price this is a great tv and I couldn't be happier!

Reviews.Title: Living Room

Reviews.Content: Bought this one for the super bowl.& moved the TCL 40" LCD HDTV purchased in 2011 to the bedroom. These are both very good TV's. The 40" seems to have somewhat sharper image and the program guide is easier to read in the blue, both are really great TV's. The picture seems best with the backlights off. Sound is not too good, but plugged some Dell computer speakers with the bass woofer down in front and it works real well..So far not a single problem with either one of them.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: beautiful picture quality, vibrant refresh, very capable sound output, bargain for the price, perfect for entertaining guests in living room

Reviews.Title: Economy
Reviews.Author: jason mumford
Reviews.Content: It seems to okay, only had it a few weeks. The HD and BD seems grainy, not as crisp, and the game console plays Netflix okay, but games seem to be dark and not able to adjust out.

Reviews.Title: Television  Set
Reviews.Author: norbert friedemann
Reviews.Content: Television SetThe television works just fine and it is all that it was supposed to be..We are very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: give it a chance...
Reviews.Author: david hackl
Reviews.Content: although you cannot achieve 120Hz @ 1080p, this unit has a decent picture and sound. Takes some tweeking of factory settings but overall a good picture. I set it up for 1080i and could only get 60Hz. hooked up 1080p blue ray and tv would not process it properly. The picture was very jumpy. watching sports seems to be fine with no real shadowing.

Reviews.Title: Not smart.
Reviews.Author: Graybear "Graybear"
Reviews.Content: I needed a tv for a bedroom and bought it quickly - I was anticipating a "smart" TV that would automatically connect to wifi.  I should have read the review more carefully - my bad.  The picture is bright and looks good.  The sound is not bad.  Plenty of inputs - thin profile - lightweight tv.  Good tv for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good Product

Reviews.Content: The Item arrived in good condition and the quality of the product is very good and I am pleased with the product especiallt the crisp clear picture.

When anyone (or anything) is wearing black or a dark color, there are no details, just a dark spot on the screen. I have tried all the settings and pre-sets, but making the darks acceptable makes other things look odd. For the price, I should not complain!

Reviews.Title: TCL 40" LED HDTV -- Love It!!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: Wanted to write a quick review on the TV as I had just received it today. Absolutely amazing is all I can say. We were replacing our boat anchor of a TV (old CRT) in our workout room with this one and by far the best choice we've ever made. Almost broke my back taking the old one off the wall. TV has outstanding picture, sound and the ease of setup was great as well. So far have not found any cons with the TV other than the fact that there is no audio output for like a stereo or anything but I have circumvented that by plugging into the headphone jack and tapping that into my stereo so I guess we're good. Hands down an absolute winner!! Thanks TCL.

Reviews.Title: where's my stuff
Reviews.Author: kevin Henderson
Reviews.Content: My item never came I've been waiting for it for the longest and I also waiting for my herb grinder

Reviews.Title: led tv
Reviews.Author: Peggie E. Baker "Peggie B"
Reviews.Content: I like this tv a lot. For the price, I am very pleased. Great color and the picture is pretty good on most programs.I replaced a plasma tv that had a great picture , until it stopped working. I would never buy plasma tv again, it got very hot and shut off for no reason, often.A common problem with plasma. So I love this new LED tv.

Reviews.Title: Great monitor, horrible tv
Reviews.Author: theWeasel0
Reviews.Content: The good:Sound is deep and rich.Colors and picture are sharp.The bad:Channel changes are horribly slow.The channel select menu changes channel as you try to scroll through it. It doesn't wait for you to select the channel.You cannot manually add channels that this tv does not find.You cannot hide inputs you don 't use.Inputs can only be selected from the menu screen or by pressing the input button over and over.Lesser cost 48" tcl tv I had was faster; i could add channels manually; inputs came up as it's own menu.

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV AND VALUE
Reviews.Author: marty70442
Reviews.Content: I'M VERY HAPPPY WITH THIS TV,IT HAS A VERY GOOD PICTURE AND SOUND IS OK.FOR THE MONEY $398.00 THRU LOW PRICE MATCH I COULDN'T BE HAPPIER ALSO KNEW BEFORE PURCHASE IT'S ONLY  60HZ NOT TRUE 120HZ (CMI ONLY)

Reviews.Title: The television advertise 120 Hz but its only 60
Reviews.Author: Richard Nowacki
Reviews.Content: I was set back when the advertisement states 120 and when I started the setup, it was only 60.I called the manufacture and they gave me some excuse, but it still doesn't make any sense when they show one thing and it not.Very disappointed in the advertisement not explaining this in the ad.The TV it self set up very easy and seems to work well.The shipping worked out well.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Bri-al
Reviews.Content: The TV has a very nice picture. Except for the reflection (I get glare from a back window I did not get from two previous TV's that I had there) and no ARC HDMI, I could not be more satisfied. Also It is manufactured by the company who makes the RCA Brand TVs. It is a good compromise between size and price. It is not a Smart TV but I was not looking for one. All in all it is a good replacement for the 42 inch Sharp that use to be there. The reason for the 4 stars is the reflection.

Reviews.Title: NOT 120HZ NOT 120HZ

Reviews.Content: Even tho your box says 120hz,  and all the online descriptions say 120hz, this TV is only 60hz, according to its own manual, and the set INFO.It is the cheapest and has decent picture when images not moving, it is easy to see the refresh rate is 60hz slow and you can see blurs and pixels if you are use to 120hz.BUYER BEWARD!!!!!

Reviews.Title: This TV is terrible!

Reviews.Content: Color is terrible, no matter how we adjust it the color is wrong.  How do I get a refund and send this piece of garbage back?  Can I rate it negative stars?

Reviews.Title: Broken

Reviews.Content: This TV seemingly is a extremely good value and has very good reviews. We got it yesterday and it was most likely Fed-Ex's fault but the whole screen was smashed. Waiting for the new replacement one to arrive.

Reviews.Title: tv lasted two months after warranty expired

Reviews.Content: Bought the tv from menards should of known better than to buy a tv that a home improvement store sells.It lasted two years and two months with very little usage.Called menards and tcl ,they wouldn't do any thing for me.

Reviews.Title: thx
Reviews.Author: Michael Ledesma
Reviews.Content: Thank you we can finally watch r porn In gloryus 1080 p HD TV by we I mean me & my girlfriend

Reviews.Title: Overpriced for this season
Reviews.Author: Charlie Tuna
Reviews.Content: After looking at a lot of tv s this no name is about 100 high for the end of a bad year.

Reviews.Title: What a scam
Reviews.Author: Tom
Reviews.Content: I just had this TV loaded in the cart for $630, I come back an hour later and it's $770, it wasn't on special or anything, I guess I witnessed the shills jacking up the price since it had hit the deal sites, and actually it was just regular price at 630.
